pkgmetadata.longdescription: [//]: # (![](docs/images/logos/logo_wide.png))# DIonPyThe `dionpy` package provides model of ionosphere refraction and attenuation based on the [IRI2020 Ionosphere Model](https://irimodel.org/).More details are available at our [documentation page](https://dionpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
